Sentiment content:7月以来，陕西榆林横山、靖边等地持续出现强降雨天气，对网络通信造成影响。中国移动陕西公司闻“汛”而动，在暴雨中开展网络抢修工作。道路泥泞，工作人员在泥土里行走，只为尽快恢复网络。目前，累计出动保障人员54人次、车辆24辆次，投入使用油机18台、储备油机20台，累计发电22站次，受灾地区通信已基本恢复
output:
"
Output:
{
    "sentiment": "positive",
    "province": "Shaanxi",
    "keyword": "strong rain, network communication, repair work, mud, personnel, oil engine, power station",
    "impactOnUsers": "Since July, strong rain has continued to occur in Yuxian, Jingbian and other places in Shaanxi, which has affected network communication. China Mobile Shaanxi Company has taken action to carry out network repair work in the rainstorm. The road is muddy and the personnel are walking in the mud in order to restore the network as soon as possible.",
    "isMajor": "Yes, it is a major sentiment because it affects the network communication of the whole province and requires a lot of personnel and resources to repair the network.",
    "manualFollow": "Yes, manual follow-up is required to ensure that the network is restored as soon as possible and that the impact of the strong rain on the network is minimized."
}"
